name: Sylvia Plath Trivia Quiz | Sylvia Plath | 5 Questions

questions.text: Sylvia Plath was married to what British poet laureate?
questions.explanation:
Ted Hughes.

	Their marriage was unhappy.

questions.text: What is the title of her only novel?
questions.explanation:
'The Bell Jar'.

	'The Bell Jar' is semi-autobiographical.

questions.text: What was her first collection of poetry called?

questions.explanation:
'Ariel'.

	'Ariel,' her most critically-acclaimed work, was published after her death.
